title: The world's largest light installation is being designed in Finland and realized on the other side of the world using new technology
content: Finnish light artist Kari Kola will create the world's largest light installation in the city of Albany in southwestern Australia in March 2026. The work is called Lighting the Sound . Kari Kola is known for creating internationally significant light installations. He has illuminated Stonehenge, the UNESCO headquarters in Paris, and created the main installation for the European Capital of Culture year in Galway in 2020.
